title: Kannukula Nikira En Kadhaliye Song Lyrics Thanimai Kadhal
stanzas:
Kannukulla nikkura
en kadhaliye
unna vittaa yaar thunaiye

kannamoodi thiranthaale
un mugamthaan
un ninaivugal pogalaiye

nenjukulla thudikkura
en heartu
un per solluthadi

enna vittu poga
nee nenachaa
 usure poguthadi

Kannukulla nikkura
en kadhaliye
unna vittaa yaar thunaiye

kannamoodi thiranthaale
un mugamthaan
un ninaivugal pogalaiye

adi maane thaene ponmaane
en kadhali endrum
neethaane

enna paathu
yaendi sirikkura
ulla yedho vachi
maraikkura

un mela kadhal
kuraiya villa
idhu yen di
unakku puriyavilla

kadhal endraal saabamaa
un kadhalicha naan paavamaa

naan thanimaiyil pesuren
naan thanimaiyil sirikuren
naan thanimaiyil azhuguren
kaaranam enna theriyavilla

un ninaivugal enna
vittu pogavilla.

ora kannaala enna paakkayila
ulla yedho aagudhu enakkula
unna marakka ennaala mudiyavilla
nee illatha vazhka thaevayilla

en kadhaliye enakku
romba pudikkum
ava pesunaa kozhandhaiyai
pol irukkum

enna pudikkaatha
maadhirithaan adhu nadikkum
aanaa kannu mattum
kaatti kodukkum

un azhaga patthi solla
vaarthai enkitta illa
enna marandhuttu
sorry solli poriye pulla

sirichu pesi pazhagi
enna yemaaththitta
enna konjam konjamaa
namba vachchi yendi
pirinjitta

thappu senjaa
thayavu seidhu
mannichidu di.
adhukkaaga pesaama
pogaathadi .

naan vazhnthaalum
seththaalum unkoodathaan
enga paathaalum unmugamthaan

unna mattum naa naa
nenachiruppen
nee varra varaikkum
kaathiruppen

nee enna marandhaa
naan uyirodavaa iruppen

en ice kattiye nee urgittiye
nee enna konjam
konjamaa marandhuttiye

unna
marakka nenachaalum
mudiyalaye
en kadhaliye devathaiye

pagalula unna paakkalannaa
iravula kan thoongaathu.
iravula kanavula neeyillanaa
en pozhudhey vidiyaathu.

Kannukulla nikkura
en kadhaliye
unna vittaa yaar thunaiye

kannamoodi thiranthaale
un mugamthaan
un ninaivugal pogalaiye

hey paaru enna enna paaru
enaku pudichathu SUPER STARu
oorukkulla enna paththi
kaettupaaru
enga schooloda vaathiyaaru
naan latea pona enna thittuvaaru

yaenda late-a vandhenu
avar kaettaa naan solluven
sir I am sorry.

so this is my character
ippadithaan iruppen eppodhume
thuru thurunu
king of the schoolu
naan oru vaalu
evan vandhaalum no Ballu

theriyaathanama en lifeula
vandhutta
therinjaa nee enna
vilagi poyita

marakka nenachaalum
marakka mudiyala
kanmunna nee
vandhu nikkura

kaadhalaala kanna
katti pottava
vera ponna paakka
nenachaalum mudiyala
thanimai romba valikkuthu
plz thaniyaa vittutu
poidaathadi .

enakku theriyum di
unna paththi un parente
yaena avangalukku
enna pudikkala di
konjam kooda yaethukaladi

jaathi madham ellaam
paakkaatha adhu
konja naal kooda
thaangaathu

ellaa kadhalum
nalla kadhal thaan
kalla kadhal endru
onnum kedaiyaathuthaan

konjam wait pannanum
konjam purinjukanum
ava sonnaa unmai
yaeththukanum

bayappada venaam di
un purushan naanthaandi
pala thadaigalaiyum thaandi
unna vazha vaippen di

saave vandhaalum
naan saaga maatten di
seththe ponaalum
unna vittu poga maatten di

[ Kannukulla nikkura
en kadhaliye
unna vittaa yaar thunaiye

kannamoodi thiranthaale
un mugamthaan
un ninaivugal pogalaiye

nenjukulla thudikkura
en heartu
un per solluthadi

enna vittu poga
nee nenachaa
 usure poguthadi ] (2)
